Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'checking the status of -- and changing your booked taxi/Uber/Lyft ride' and 'party RSVP' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also play up to two rounds of trivia with the assistant.  [instruction 1 of 5]
Hello!  I need to check the status of my ride please.  Can you help?
Please have some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at some point in this dialogue. [instruction 2 of 5]
What is ybour name?
May I have your name, please?
Yes it is Mark.  My ride id is 259.  I sure hope my driver isn't too close already!

Item.RideStatus: Your ride is on its way.

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your ride is on its way.

Events.Text: Your ride is 3 minutes away.

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your ride is on its way.

Events.Text: Your ride is 3 minutes away.
Oh dang I needed to make a quick change.  I hope it's not too late.  Can you see if you can hurry and add another passenger for me?
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want X', or 'anything but Y', etc.) [instruction 3 of 5]

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your ride is on its way.
Your ride is on its way.

Item.ChangeStatus: We are unable to change your trip.

PrimaryItem.ChangeStatus: We are unable to change your trip.

Events.Text: The trip is unable to be changed

PrimaryItem.ChangeStatus: We are unable to change your trip.

Events.Text: Unfortunately I wasn't able to update your booking, sorry.
Hmmm I wonder if I can hide my friend in my suitcase then.  Guess I'll give it a shot.  They are pretty short so it might work.  Well do you think you could help me RSVP to a party then?
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics. [instruction 4 of 5]

PrimaryItem.ChangeStatus: We are unable to change your trip.
We are unable to change your trip.

Events.Text: What is the venue name?

PrimaryItem.ChangeStatus: We are unable to change your trip.

Events.Text: At what venue is the party taking place?
Let's try for North Heights Venue.  I hear it's a pretty groovy spot.

PrimaryItem.ChangeStatus: We are unable to change your trip.

Events.Text: What is the host name?

PrimaryItem.ChangeStatus: We are unable to change your trip.

Events.Text: Could you provide me with the name of the host, please?
Yes the host is my friend Ben.  We would like to have the party around 8 pm and there will be 25 of us.

Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('checking the status of -- and changing your booked taxi/Uber/Lyft ride' and 'party RSVP') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 5 of 5]

PrimaryItem.ChangeStatus: We are unable to change your trip.

Events.Text: Do you require parking?

PrimaryItem.ChangeStatus: We are unable to change your trip.

Events.Text: Do you require parking at the venue?
No I think we are all going to walk.

PrimaryItem.ChangeStatus: We are unable to change your trip.

Item.Message: Thank you for your RSVP. See you there.

Events.Text: You have successfully RSVP'd

PrimaryItem.Message: Thank you for your RSVP. See you there.

Events.Text: Great, your rsvp is all done and confirmed!
Awesome!  You are quite an efficient AI Assistant!  Thank you so much for all your help today!

PrimaryItem.Message: Thank you for your RSVP. See you there.

Events.Text: Is there anything else I can do for you?

PrimaryItem.Message: Thank you for your RSVP. See you there.

Events.Text: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
That's it!  Thank you!

PrimaryItem.Message: Thank you for your RSVP. See you there.

Events.Text: Thank you and goodbuye

PrimaryItem.Message: Thank you for your RSVP. See you there.

Events.Text: Thank you and goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Mark
- You've booked a ride with id 259
- Today is Monday the 9th, 4 pm

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Check the status of your ride (id 259)
- Change something about your booked ride
- RSVP you to a party (Example venues: Southside Venue or North Heights Venue)
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Assume:

- Today is Monday the 9th, 4 pm

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
